GDP of Guatemala: ~$60B. Cost to eat Guatemala with a tortilla, chicken, and cheese? Under $5. #Bargains https://t.co/2wmW2I7Gzh
@darrwest Professor West, I hope you're keeping your technical skills up to date! Frankly, I'm flattered that you remember me. :-) #brown
I'd rather have Hoyer at less than 1/3 the cost of Osweiler. Would be interesting if Broncos offered a late-round pick for him. #QB
@nikbonaddio Nas? Seriously? Everyone knows that the smart money is with Chamillionaire. https://t.co/1mtDackOXO #kurtisblowventures
@PeterKBonney @Dnordfors Fortunately, my value is maximized on a yacht. Let's send current yachters to Myanmar. #davidricardo
RT @nikbonaddio Man, thank God for @angellist, or else I wouldn't be able to make terrible life-decisions like investing in Nas' syndicate.
To all unsanctioned graffiti artists.... https://t.co/kerhcpHssL #math #Banksy
I am going to science the shit out of my startup.... I'm lucky to have run in cockroach mode in the past. #itsfine https://t.co/48NWH8Vmwb
"Venting anger is...similar to emotional farting in a closed area. It sounds like a good idea, but it's dead wrong." https://t.co/dyucM1CTLJ
@adamcohen Thanks for the flattery -- that's very kind! #blushing
Saw @Chad_Hurley had a spat with @mcuban: https://t.co/sdNHVGSh4a. Cuban passed on my pre-YouTube video community site. #missedopportunity
Nice piece on how data science tools are only valuable to those who know how to wield them appropriately. https://t.co/fTebhxy6fg

My first-ever LinkedIn posting made it into Pulse: https://t.co/9mEqFsm1Sy. Thinking that I should simply go out on top.... #earlyretirement
"Everything is Awful and We're All Going to Fail" by @davidwadler on @LinkedIn https://t.co/mi1EKF1hVd
Do they have room for one more? https://t.co/VaM611rtdf
Great bit on renting vs. buying. I've had the discussion many times, but this is very well articulated: https://t.co/LWdPHFeDXf. #rentvsbuy
@jkld11 I keep telling you.... Our firstborn is contest ready! #absofsteel
RT @etanjc: I never expected #idiocracy to become a documentary.
@vdignan I attended your growth hacking talk last night. It was excellent! Densely packed with info and I picked up some fashion tips.
If forgettable aphorisms and other trite sayings were banned from Twitter, the service would be a barren wasteland. #postsomethinggood
@Planet_Ivy Sure... I'd be interested in details. As you are messaging lots of people, I saw some EventBrite links. Is that the best way?
Building *the* winner in a winner-take-all market is really, really hard. Who woulda thunk it? https://t.co/gf3qW4QvXp #unicornfatigue
https://t.co/eVQpGctffZ. Fascinating, but the TLDR version isn't terribly newsworthy; housing is crazy expensive in NYC. #nycrealestate

My LinkedIn profile ranking shows that I'm with 4 spots of 3 other @BrownUniversity alums: @ifain, @rudmila, @owendavis. #smallworld
Some think Zabar's is the "Mecca" of Jewish (emphasis on "ish") groceries. The appearance of Jesus further confuses. https://t.co/pNgw66PX8I
RT @ahier: The shocking confessions of a naturopathic doctor https://t.co/Ddht1AxMQJ by @NaturoDiaries on @KevinMD
@saturnspike Does that mean marketing spend is getting ramped up?

@kevinseaman, are you volunteering to install Ubuntu on those Microsoft Surface machines?
These people are out of their minds! #pbr https://t.co/E9yGqIeOJt
@pbr - We are watching with clenched teeth and sweaty hands from Section 116, Row 12, Seats 5-8!!! #ridethosebulls
@saturnspike I did round. If you ask my daughter, she'll tell you that she is 6 2/3. I always try to round a bit more than my kids.
That time when your 6.5-year-old asks, "Are @PuffinsCereal made from real penguins?" #puffinsarenotpenguins #meatcereal
@kategarrick I was just talking about you. Hope you're well and your ears aren't burning! #shesmostlyoffthegrid
RT @PeterKBonney: Multicellular organisms 1, microbes... er, 1. Whatever. At least we're keeping up. https://t.co/IrfOhvbnts
RT @pmarca: But optimism is also how CEOs lead their companies to do great new things. @modestproposal1 @bhorowitz https://t.co/hojCrKFk3V
It will be interesting to see what happens when the young pitching talent becomes arbitration eligible. https://t.co/0FehC0Dgqo #nymets
The microbiome is endlessly fascinating. We are more "something else" than we are ourselves. https://t.co/m0hfS7A7RU #guthealth
@SanFranciscoVC The Hannukah number is surprisingly high. The observance rate far exceeds the percentage of Jewish people in the U.S.
It's a freemium Hugs-as-a-Service model. You can sign up for the 10 hugs/month package for just $4.99/month. #haas https://t.co/DeOD84k0qC
"CIOs identified SaaS as one of their top priorities for 2016." Tied with security for #1. #saas https://t.co/6B6B4cAbek
My 6-year-old daughter was fighting insomnia. I told her to focus on her breath. "That's so boring," she replied. Point made. #om #meditate
And one more time for good measure for the @BrownAnnualFund! #Give2BrownU
Today is #GivingTuesday. Fellow @brunonia96, take a look at how your gift can help: https://t.co/roaSrk9CwZ. #BrownUniversity #annualfund
https://t.co/i2Xlpy4A8U -- Take that, laws of thermodynamics! Gut microbiotica ftw! #microbiome
Off my list of good ideas: "Do squats, then go to a showing of The Martian that begins at 10:50pm." #ouch #squats
Dead? Doesn't seem like it. Undead? Likely in the literal sense of the word. Crossover with @TheWalkingDead? Nah. https://t.co/kqiOa58svx
https://t.co/fPjpZ8KI02 -- Cleaner air, better earth, less conflict, more money. But not easy. #100percentcleanenergy
I think there are more Israeli tech startups in NYC than there are tech startups in most US cities: https://t.co/aVHGzep6Lw. #startup
"Trying to get everyone to like you is a sign of mediocrity." --Colin Powell
I had a lightbulb moment for a business. It has a big, ever-renewing market and is timely. Need to figure out if it's worth doing or not.
In my bid to start tweeting, I'm going through some old material. Yes, this is me, doing the worm at user conf. https://t.co/Xm452lXRyT
To fully grok @twitter, I've started to actually use it. Right away, I started getting follows from fake accounts. Fake people love me!
Firing the entitled undermines their sense of entitlement, calling the assessment into question!#cognitivedissonance https://t.co/RYqg0DT4yE
Preaching to the choir before the choir starts singing for its $9.95/month subscribers.  https://t.co/GsjpaEFRRx
https://t.co/uBdmfUqjid … I'm a laughing investor today. :-) Great job @_hochalicious and the team at @Overgrad!
Thanks @bruceyywang. That was refreshingly honest. Coincidentally (?) he stepped down from his CEO role yesterday: http://t.co/hwlH2WUP0Y
It's official, I married a celebrity! Congrats on your IMDB entry, @jkld11 --  http://t.co/XlOmT07DnS
Those of you who work for me and manifest these qualities, I hope I tell you often enough! http://t.co/V2utaPtcVX
Going from svn to git; this is really helpful: http://t.co/yyMUuFDpji
@bruceyywang, I don't recall ever suggesting that they weren't! @kevinseaman @Dropbox
A great, big "thank you" to all of you who helped/supported/encouraged me:  http://t.co/oWROpr52Qq. We're very excited for the future!
On my lunch receipt today: "You have been served by Destiny." I guess this whole self-determination is out the window. #fate
@jkld11 Your tweets are amazing for their brevity and volume.
http://t.co/TviZohBz Amazing to see how much things have changed here in NYC -- (tech) culturally -- over the past 5 or 6 years.
Waiting to go to the delivery room, but doubtful that we will have the first baby of 2012 (NYC).
Kris Drey does the impossible -- makes my opinions appear credible! :-) http://t.co/b2lravu4 #vidcompare #twistage
Twistage, Inc. is hiring a Engineering Manager http://t.co/l2g3VgAR
Awesome subway ride! Gangsta-rapping transvestite to my left and a woman reciting bible verses to my right. Both loudly. #nycsubway
On the subway platform. "I want to see this movie," said the woman, pointing at the War Horse poster. "Anything with horses in it." #lowbar
On my way to a meeting with @JiveSoftware to renew vows. :-) (How romantic!) CalTrain is surprisingly quiet - no calls, no typing....
Now that I know @eldoradovc is following me, I have added pressure to increase my Tweet rate. And voila, here is Tweet number 12!
LinkedIn says 117 of my connections changed jobs in 2010. That's more than 27% of them. Impressive in an economy with such poor job growth.
My wife is going to be on tonight's ABC special about People mag's Sexiest Man issue. Will she mention me? It's a marital moral imperative!
@DsmithsBen The movement has officially begun. At Twistage, December is now reverse alphabetical order month. W's, X's, Y's, & Z's rejoice!
In SF for a few days and then taking the dreaded "Red Eye" back to NYC on Saturday.
CNN has an article where the author uses the term "credible psychic" (http://bit.ly/vZOTM). What is the world coming to?
msg to my followers: I am a lousy Tweeter owing to my schedule and general lack of hipness. I own a Blackberry for crying out loud!

@ryanlawler Online video vulture??? (http://bit.ly/13StAX
) No way; we're totally a hyena!
@flowplayer Great to see that you're integrating the "load player in a Flash container" stuff. Is that the code from us (Twistage)?
On Huffington Post, waxing philosphical:  http://bit.ly/8GIm2
Spending more time than I should re-reading H264 encoding parameters ... finding my nerdier impulses!
Congratulations Jonathan Cobb, entrepreneur & Bocce Ball star! http://bit.ly/qgb2H
